about.summary: Easy-to-use Modbus RTU and Modbus ASCII implementation for Python.

name: minimalmodbus
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "minimalmodbus" %}
{% set version = "1.0.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5c55b1e26131e1f3b7fe55b950f8abb8a2396b77f73bc0a513cc3ef0051db526

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - pyserial >=3

test:
  imports:
    - minimalmodbus

about:
  home: https://github.com/pyhys/minimalmodbus
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Easy-to-use Modbus RTU and Modbus ASCII implementation for Python.'
  doc_url: https://minimalmodbus.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/pyhys/minimalmodbus

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - carlodri
